item.description: Since I live just around the corner in Amesbury, I am going to do this walk. I've walked this park many times and have a good map also. We'll meet in the parking lot at 11:45, begin walking at noon. So if you're willing to take a chance on the weather please join us. Warm clothes, a face mask and fast moving pace will keep us warm. My phone is 978-269-4232
item.how_to_find_us: I have a Silver Honda Fit

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Maudslay Walk Sunday Rescheduled
